00024 #define NFILE_POS 8L
00025 
00026 #define NATOMS_POS 268L
00027 
00028 #define FRAMEDATA_POS 276L
00029 
00030 namespace McMd

00048    static unsigned int read_int(std::fstream &file)
00049    {
00050       unsigned int val;
00051       file.read((char *)&val, sizeof(unsigned int));
00052       return val;
00053    }
00054 
00055    void DCDTrajectoryIo::readHeader(std::fstream &file)
00056    {
00057       // Calculate atomCapacity for entire simulation
00058       int atomCapacity = 0;
00059       int bondCapacity = 0;
00060       int nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00061       int speciesCapacity = 0;
00062       int iSpec,iMol;
00063       Species* speciesPtr;
00064       Molecule* molPtr;
00065    
00066       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00067         speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00068         speciesCapacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00069     
00070         // Add molecules to system
00071         for (iMol = 0; iMol < speciesCapacity; ++iMol) {
00072           molPtr = &(speciesPtr->reservoir().pop());
00073           system().addMolecule(*molPtr);
00074         }
00075         atomCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nAtom();
00076         bondCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nBond();
00077        }
00078     
00079       // read number of frames
00080       file.seekp(NFILE_POS);
00081       nFrames_ = read_int(file);
00082     
00083       file.seekp(NATOMS_POS);
00084       nAtoms_ = read_int(file);
00085       if (nAtoms_ != atomCapacity) {
00086         std::ostringstream oss;
00087         oss << "Number of atoms in DCD file (" << nAtoms_ << ") does not "
00088              << "match allocated number of atoms (" << atomCapacity  << ")!";
00089         UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00090       }
00091     
00092       file.seekp(FRAMEDATA_POS);
00093 
00094       xBuffer_.allocate(nAtoms_);
00095       yBuffer_.allocate(nAtoms_);
00096       zBuffer_.allocate(nAtoms_);
00097    }
00098 
00099    void DCDTrajectoryIo::readFrame(std::fstream &file)
00100    {
00101       double lx,ly,lz;
00102       double angle0,angle1,angle2;
00103 
00104       Vector lengths;
00105 
00106       // Read frame header
00107       int headerSize;
00108       headerSize=read_int(file);
00109       if (headerSize != 6*sizeof(double)) {
00110          std::ostringstream oss;
00111          oss << "Unknown file format!";
00112          UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00113       }
00114 
00115       file.read((char *)&lx, sizeof(double));
00116       file.read((char *)&angle0, sizeof(double));
00117       file.read((char *)&ly, sizeof(double));
00118       file.read((char *)&angle1, sizeof(double));
00119       file.read((char *)&angle2, sizeof(double));
00120       file.read((char *)&lz, sizeof(double));
00121 
00122       headerSize=read_int(file);
00123       if (headerSize != 6*sizeof(double)) {
00124          std::ostringstream oss;
00125          oss << "Unkown file format!";
00126          UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00127       }
00128    
00129       if (!file.good()) {
00130          std::ostringstream oss;
00131          oss << "Error reading trajectory file!";
00132          UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00133       }
00134    
00135       lengths[0]=lx;
00136       lengths[1]=ly;
00137       lengths[2]=lz;
00138       boundary().setLengths(lengths);
00139 
00140       // Read frame data
00141       int blockSize;
00142 
00143       // read cords
00144       blockSize = read_int(file);
00145       file.read((char *) xBuffer_.cArray(), sizeof(float) * nAtoms_);
00146       read_int(file); // blockSize
00147     
00148       if (blockSize != (int)sizeof(float)*nAtoms_) {
00149          std::ostringstream oss;
00150          oss << "Invalid frame size (got " << blockSize << ", expected " << nAtoms_ << ")";
00151          UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00152       }
00153     
00154       blockSize = read_int(file);
00155       file.read((char *) yBuffer_.cArray(), sizeof(float) * nAtoms_);
00156       read_int(file); // blockSize
00157     
00158       if (blockSize != (int)sizeof(float)*nAtoms_) {
00159          std::ostringstream oss;
00160          oss << "Invalid frame size (got " << blockSize << ", expected " << nAtoms_ << ")";
00161          UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00162       }
00163     
00164       blockSize = read_int(file);
00165       file.read((char *) zBuffer_.cArray(), sizeof(float) * nAtoms_);
00166       read_int(file); // blockSize
00167       
00168       if (blockSize != (int)sizeof(float)* nAtoms_) {
00169          std::ostringstream oss;
00170          oss << "Invalid frame size (got " << blockSize << ", expected " << nAtoms_ << ")";
00171          UTIL_THROW(oss.str().c_str());
00172       }
00173     
00174       // Load positions, assume they are ordered according to species
00175       int iSpecies,iMol;
00176       int bufferIdx=0;
00177       Species *speciesPtr;
00178       Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00179       Molecule *molPtr;
00180     
00181       for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00182          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpecies);
00183          for (iMol = 0; iMol < speciesPtr->capacity(); ++iMol) {
00184             molPtr = &system().molecule(iSpecies, iMol);
00185             for (molPtr->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00186                atomIter->position()[0] = (double) xBuffer_[bufferIdx];
00187                atomIter->position()[1] = (double) yBuffer_[bufferIdx];
00188                atomIter->position()[2] = (double) zBuffer_[bufferIdx];
00189     
00190                // shift into simulation cell
00191                boundary().shift(atomIter->position());
00192     
00193                bufferIdx++;
00194             }
00195          }
00196       }
00197    }
00198 } 
00199 #endif
